entry.def: A plasterer is a person whose job it is to cover walls and ceilings with plaster.

means.word_mean: 1. a worker skilled in applying plaster

auth_sentence.content: Thirty-year-old Patrick Yaw, from Ghana, worked as a plasterer in Libya.
